00022 #ifndef _MAS5Workflow_HEADER_
00023 #define _MAS5Workflow_HEADER_

00025 /*! \file MAS5Workflow.h Defines a class to provide the workflow of calling the MAS5 algorithm and saving the results to a CHP file. */
00026 
00027 #include "mas5-stat/src/ExpressionAlgorithmImplementation.h"
00028 //
00029 #include "exp_report/src/ExpressionReportControls.h"
00030 //
00031 #include <cstring>
00032 #include <string>
00033 //
00034 
00035 /*! Provide the workflow of calling the MAS5 algorithm and saving the results to a CHP file. */
00036 class MAS5Workflow
00037 {
00038         /*! An error message. */
00039         std::string errorMsg;
00040 
00041         /*! The MAS5 algorithm implmentation object. */
00042         CExpressionAlgorithmImplementation exp;
00043 
00044         /*! The probe pair threshold for the report. */
00045         int probePairThreshold;
00046 
00047         /*! The expression controls for the report. */
00048         ExpressionReport::ExpressionControls controls;
00049 
00050         /*! Indicates if the data should be saved to the old format CHP file. */
00051         bool saveToLegacyFile;
00052 
00053     /*! The program name. */
00054     std::wstring programName;
00055     
00056     /*! The company name. */
00057     std::wstring programCompany;
00058     
00059     /*! The ID of the program. */
00060     std::wstring programId;
00061 
00062 public:
00063         /*! Constructor */
00064         MAS5Workflow();
00065 
00066         /*! Destructor */
00067         ~MAS5Workflow();
00068 
00069         /*! Clears them members. */
00070         void Clear();
00071 
00072         /*! Get the last error. */
00073         std::string GetError() { return errorMsg; }
00074 
00075         /*! Gets the algorithm parameters. */
00076         CExpStatAlgSettings &AlgParameters() { return exp.GetParameters(); }
00077 
00078         /*! The probe pair threshold for the report. */
00079         int &ProbePairThreshold() { return probePairThreshold; }
00080 
00081         /*! Indicates if the data should be saved to the old format CHP file. */
00082         bool &SaveToLegacyFile() { return saveToLegacyFile; }
00083 
00084         /*! The expression controls for the report. */
00085         ExpressionReport::ExpressionControls &ReportControls() { return controls; }
00086 
00087         /*! Executes the algorithm, report and saves the results to a CHP file.
00088          * @param celFile The input CEL file.
00089          * @param baselineCelFile The baseline file, empty if no comparison analysis is to be performed.
00090          * @param cdfFile The CDF file name (full path).
00091          * @param chpFile The name of the output CHP file.
00092          * @return True if success.
00093          */
00094         bool Execute(const std::string &celFile, const std::string &baselineCelFile, const std::string &cdfFile, const std::string &chpFile);
00095 
00096     /*! The program name. */
00097     std::wstring &ProgramName() { return programName; }
00098     
00099     /*! The company name. */
00100     std::wstring &ProgramCompany() { return programCompany; }
00101     
00102     /*! The ID of the program. */
00103     std::wstring &ProgramId() { return programId; }
00104 
00105 };
00106 
00107 #endif
